description: Islamic Development Bank Grant in support of Civil Societies in East Jerusalem in the form of rehabilitation work and provision of needed equipment and furniture

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: As part of the Islamic Development Bank support to societies in East Jerusalem, this grant covers rehabilitation works and provision of needed equipment and furniture to seven organizations in the city
subproject.title: Emergency Assistance to Civil
